youtube.title: How Fraternal Twins Are Formed: Step-by-Step Animation
youtube.description: Discover the biological process of fraternal twin development. This 3D animation shows two separate eggs being fertilized by two different sperm, leading to the growth of two unique babies in the mother's womb. Perfect for biology students and curious minds!
